Functions
LR_fnc_Arsenal
Description

Fills Arsenal with predefined equipment dependent on _Type. Each Arsenal can be a different type and have a different duration.

Arguments
_object

Object the Arsenal is applied to.  <OBJECT>

_type

Type of Arsenal, can be "VANILLA", "3CB, or "RHS" <STRING>

_Duration

How long in minutes until the Arsenal is removed. 0 makes it permanent. <SCALAR>

Examples
[this] call LR_fnc_Arsenal;
[this, "3CB", 50] call LR_fnc_Arsenal;
[this, "VANILLA"] call LR_fnc_Arsenal;
[MyAmmoCrate, "RHS", 0] call LR_fnc_Arsenal;

Author: MitchJC
